meanings.definition: A person who plays golf on a links course.
meanings.sent1: The linksman carefully lined up his shot on the sandy course.
meanings.sent2: The linksman enjoyed the challenge of the open, windswept links course.
meanings.sent3: The linksman's ball got lost in the sand trap, making him feel like a beachcomber.
meanings.sent4: As the linksman swung his club, it was like a dance with the wind.
meanings.sent5: The linksman's hat flew off in the strong breeze, adding to the drama of his game.

meanings.definition: A golfer who specializes in playing on links courses.
meanings.sent1: The skilled linksman won the tournament on the coastal course.
meanings.sent2: The linksman's expertise shone through on the rugged links terrain.
meanings.sent3: The linksman's caddy joked that he must have sand in his veins from playing so much on links courses.
meanings.sent4: Watching the linksman play was like witnessing a master painter at work on a canvas of grass.
meanings.sent5: The linksman's precision with each swing was like a symphony of golfing skill.
